directive_ref: CEO DIRECTIVE WAVE 15/15A - AUTONOMOUS GOLDEN NEEDLE HUNT WITH SOURCE ATTRIBUTION

sources.snippet_or_excerpt: Crypto market falls to $2.91 trillion as Bitcoin corrects and Midnight plunges amid liquidation-driven selling pressure.
Bitcoin's price was unable to break above $90000 convincingly and is once again found into a retracement.
APT declined on heavy volume as the CoinDesk 20 index fell 2.8%.
Bitcoin price has oscillated between a mid-range support level and an upper resistance band below a key overhead level, with multiple...
The past 24 hours saw the broader cryptocurrency market continue its choppy price action, with the majority trading in the red.

hypothesis_content.title: Failed Range High Retest as Bearish Breakout Precursor
hypothesis_content.statement: In a NEUTRAL or early BEAR regime, if price rallies to retest a clearly defined 7-day range high (within 0.3%) but fails to close a 4-hour candle above it, and is then rejected on a subsequent candle with volume > 1.2x average, it signals a high-probability breakdown below the 7-day range low within the next 36 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: This tests the 'path of least resistance' theory. A failure to overcome clear resistance after a test, especially with confirming volume, indicates exhaustion of buying pressure. In neutral/bearish contexts, this often precedes a liquidation of longs and a breakdown as the market seeks a new, lower equilibrium.
entry_conditions: Market regime is NEUTRAL or BEAR (A/D line declining).
Price touches within 0.3% of the 7-day high but the 4H candle closes below that level.
The following 4H candle is a bearish rejection (lower close) with volume > 1.2 * 20-period avg volume.
Enter short on the break below the 7-day range low.

exit_conditions.stop_loss: A 4H candle closes above the 7-day range high.
exit_conditions.time_exit: 36 hours after entry if range low is not breached.

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 65% of such 'failed retest' setups do not result in a breakdown below the corresponding range low within the 36-hour window, suggesting the market more often absorbs selling at resistance and continues ranging.
